00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include "mscb.h"
00026 
00027 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00028 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00029 
00030 char code node_name[] = "SCS-DEMO";
00031 
00032 #define GAIN      0             // gain for internal PGA
00033 
00034 sbit VALVE = P0 ^ 7;
00035 
00036 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to the CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00037 
00038 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00039 
00040 struct {
00041    float temp[2];
00042    unsigned char sw;
00043 } idata user_data;
00044 
00045 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00046    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp0", &user_data.temp[0],
00047    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp1", &user_data.temp[1],
00048    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Switch", &user_data.sw,
00049    0
00050 };
00051 
00052 /********************************************************************\
00053 
00054   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00055 
00056 \********************************************************************/
00057 
00058 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00059 
00060 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00061 
00062 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00063 {
00064    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00065    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00066    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC
00067 
00068    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00069    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00070    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00071 
00072    PRT0CF = 0xFF;               // P0 on push-pull
00073 
00074    if (init) {
00075       user_data.temp[0] = 0;
00076       user_data.temp[1] = 0;
00077       user_data.sw = 0;
00078    }
00079 
00080    VALVE = user_data.sw;
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00084 
00085 #pragma NOAREGS
00086 
00087 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00088 {
00089    if (index == 2)
00090       VALVE = user_data.sw;
00091 }
00092 
00093 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00094 
00095 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00096 {
00097    if (index);
00098    return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00102 
00103 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00104 {
00105    if (data_in);
00106    if (data_out);
00107    return 0;
00108 }

00110 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 
00112 void adc_read()
00113 {
00114    static unsigned char channel = 0;
00115    static unsigned long value;
00116    static unsigned char cnt = 0;
00117    unsigned char i;
00118    float t;
00119 
00120    if (cnt == 0) {
00121       /* switch between channels 0 and 4 */
00122       channel = channel == 0 ? 5 : 0;
00123       AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00124       ADC0CF = 0xE0 | (GAIN & 0x07);    // 16 system clocks and gain
00125 
00126       value = 0;
00127    }
00128 
00129    /* integrate 16 times */
00130    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00131       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00132 
00133       ADCINT = 0;
00134       ADBUSY = 1;
00135       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00136 
00137       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00138 
00139       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00140       yield();
00141    }
00142 
00143    cnt++;
00144 
00145    if (cnt == 0) {              /* average 16*256 = 4096 times */
00146       value /= 256;
00147 
00148       /* convert to volts, times 100deg/Volt */
00149       t = value / 65536.0 * 2.5 * 100;
00150 
00151       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00152       if (channel == 0)
00153          user_data.temp[0] = t;
00154       else
00155          user_data.temp[1] = t;
00156       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00157    }
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00162 
00163 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164 
00165 void user_loop(void)
00166 {
00167    /* read temperature */
00168    adc_read();
00169 }
